text: <@U07652WMYRH> could you double check you are using a developer test account and not developer sandbox? You'll need to update this link with the portal id for your developer test account `<https://app.HubSpot.com/product-updates/><portal_id>/?query=CRM%2520devel`
Can you confirm the version with `hs --version`
I ended up swapping to my companies sandbox account and it worked fine after I opted into the 'UI Extentions Beta'
Embedded google map address picker! woo

<@U7W5SDG3D> I've passed this request along to the team in charge. Currently, you can conditionally display cards on the left sidebar and the preview sidebar. The team is looking into expanding these locations but no specific timeline yet. Will let you know when we have any updates there:+1:
Hey Erik, I will add that conditional display is not available for extension cards, yet. We will work with other teams internally to arrive at a solution.
